definition: country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)

sentences.english: Every day I drift into sleep. Every night I dream.
After some time he sensed she was beginning to fall asleep in spite of herself.
sentences.chinese: 過了一會兒他感覺到她開始不由自主地落入睡鄉。

sentences.english: The lullaby had the baby into the land of Nod in no time.
sentences.chinese: 催眠曲一下子就把嬰兒送入了睡鄉。
